quest.name: Pieces of You
journal:
Managingway would like to add your personal touch to a new capitalistic enterprise.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the excitable Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.
Deliver the requested items to the excitable Loporrit.
objectives: Synthesize [Error]Deliver [Error] to the excitable Loporrit.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Coiningway's dream of opening a shopping station has been realized, but its available products are still rather limited.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: After considering what else we might offer, we have collectively decided that memorabilia inscribed with your signature would be a most desirable item. You are the moon's leading celebrity, after all.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Those personalized memorabilia you provided us proved more popular than we anticipated. We sold them all just as soon as we stocked them!

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Might you craft us some more? Needy Ways await.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We will, of course, provide adequate compensation for your time, labor, and use of your likeness. One of our Ways eagerly awaits you in Greatest Endsvale whenever you wish to begin production.

dialogue.name: WORKINGSUPPORTER
dialogue.text: <blip> Please state your request.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04691
dialogue.text: Oooh! Forename Surname, welcome, welcome! You've come to make some memorabilia for us, yes? It's an honor to assist you, misssir.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04691
dialogue.text: Anything you make is certain to sell like carrot cake, but our Ways would particularly love something with your name on it. And perhaps your face. Whatever you think is best!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04691
dialogue.text: Anything you make is certain to sell like carrot cake, but our Ways would particularly love something with your name on it. And perhaps your face. Whatever you think is best!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04691
dialogue.text: Anything you make is certain to sell like carrot cake, but our Ways would particularly love something with your name on it. And perhaps your face. Maybe even edible? I'll leave it to your discretion!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04691
dialogue.text: I've stocked this doing supporter with all sorts of materials, so don't worry about running out of supplies. Oh, I can't wait to see what you come up with!

dialogue.name: WORKINGSUPPORTER
dialogue.text: <blip> This supporter detects sufficient supplies in your inventory. Please believe in yourself and enjoy crafting!

dialogue.name: WORKINGSUPPORTER
dialogue.text: <blip> This supporter detects sufficient supplies in your inventory. Please believe in yourself and enjoy crafting!

dialogue.name: WORKINGSUPPORTER
dialogue.text: <blip> This supporter detects sufficient supplies in your inventory. Please believe in yourself and enjoy crafting!

dialogue.name: WORKINGSUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Distributing helpful supplies now.

dialogue.name: WORKINGSUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Distributing helpful supplies now.

dialogue.name: WORKINGSUPPORTER
dialogue.text: Thank you for your supply request. <blip> Distributing helpful supplies now.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04691
dialogue.text: Are you finished? Can I see?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT04691
dialogue.text: Oh, how lovely! An item worthy of Forename Surname's name. I'll go and stock these in the shopping station straightaway─the others will riot when they see! Perhaps literally, now that I think about it. Oh dear... Er, Managingway should have your compensation waiting for you.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank you for your cooperation, Forename. For all the help and hope you've given us, I am sure those mementos will be our shopping station's best seller.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Speaking of which, I must secure one for myself... Er, strictly for managerial purposes! Ahem.
